name: Silly Face
description: Analyze a single face, detect the landmarks, enlarge the mouth and switch the eyes

name: Face Collage
description: The example analyzes images of faces, detects the eyes and the mouth and allows you to make silly collages

name: Classification to sounds
description: Train a Neural Network to distinguish between class A and class B and play back sounds for each class

name: Trainable Camera
description: Teach your webcam when to take a picture

name: Playback Rate Camera
description: Teach the system when to play back a sound at full speed and when to play it a lower playback rates using regression

name: Mr Bean regression
description: The example lets you train a regression model with our webcam and use it to control Mr Bean

name: Classification to speech
description: Classifies object from the webcam and use p5.speech to have the labels spoken out loud

name: What Rhymes With This?
description: Detect an object and use RiTA to find words that rhyme

name: Hand Tracking + KNN Classifier
description: Train a KNN to detect your finger gestures

name: Don't Touch Your Face
description: Combine poseNet and KNN and teach the system to detect when you are touching your face

name: Multiple regression generative art
description: Train a relationship between a lo-res video feed and a generative artwork

name: Pose2chair
description: Control a chair with your body

name: Pitch Detection Painting
description: Paint while you sing or play music

name: Pitch Detection Painting Advanced
description: Advanced sound controlled painting with kaleidoscope effect

name: Blair Witch Flashlight
description: Track your nose and make a spooky flashlight effect

name: PoseNet variable font
description: A variable font that changes based on the distance between your eyes

name: Art or Trash?
description: Upload an image and let the classifier decide if it is art or trash

name: Teachable Machine + Emojis
description: Load a model trained with Teachable Machine and output emojis that fit the classification

name: Speech Controlled Snake Game
description: Play the game of Snake with simple speech commands

name: Speech Controlled Bugs
description: Control a system of little objects with speech commands

name: Virtual Background
description: Segment a persons body and place a virtual background video behind it

name: Person Cube
description: Segment a persons body and use it as a texture on a 3D object

name: Word2Vec suggestion tool
description: Have Word2vec come up with alternatives as you type

name: Similar Words Floating in Space
description: Shout a word and watch as similar words follow it

name: Objects to Sound
description: Detect animals in images and click them to play back sounds

name: Emoji Objects
description: Detect objects with COCO-SSD and place emojis on top of them
